data.text:
@HOPELESSNBHD You're not being mean, you're just expressing your own honest opinion.
Some may prefer other celeb as Lara Croft but mostly, they like Angelina as Lara Croft and they're not comfortable with other actresses portraying the iconic role.
@HOPELESSNBHD Not mean at all. You speak the truth, it is what it is, Angelina Jolie is one and only Lara Croft.
